ygData.subject: Re: Binding
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not saying you don t die I m saying you don t die near as often and if you do there are so many more ways to get back quickly at high levels not to mention
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not saying you don't die I'm saying you don't die near as often and if you do there are so many more ways to get back quickly at high levels not to mention you can also avoid death a lot easier. I also play a Necromancer and with Journeyman Boots I basically never die for the most part. I died twice yesterday before that it had been over two weeks before my last death. All I'm saying is that the bind issue is not that big of a deal especially at high levels.

Conaldar Human Bard of E'ci
Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of E'ci



>At 30+ you basically don't die ...

Ah if only that were true =)

i died twice yesterday =( it may have had something to do with the level 48
paladin we were trying to kill hehe.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 8 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
